315                             void (*xStep)(sqlite3_context*,int,sqlite3_value**),
316                             void (*xFinal)(sqlite3_context*),

329 /*
330 ** This is the function signature used for all extension entry points.  It
331 ** is also defined in the file "loadext.c".
332 */
333 typedef int (*sqlite3_loadext_entry)(
334   sqlite3 *db,                       /* Handle to the database. */
335   char **pzErrMsg,                   /* Used to set error string on failure. */
336   const sqlite3_api_routines *pThunk /* Extension API function pointers. */
337 );
338 
339 /*
340 ** The following macros redefine the API routines so that they are
341 ** redirected through the global sqlite3_api structure.
342 **
343 ** This header file is also used by the loadext.c source file
344 ** (part of the main SQLite library - not an extension) so that
345 ** it can get access to the sqlite3_api_routines structure
346 ** definition.  But the main library does not want to redefine

597 /* Version 3.24.0 and later */
598 #define sqlite3_keyword_count          sqlite3_api->keyword_count
599 #define sqlite3_keyword_name           sqlite3_api->keyword_name
600 #define sqlite3_keyword_check          sqlite3_api->keyword_check
601 #define sqlite3_str_new                sqlite3_api->str_new
602 #define sqlite3_str_finish             sqlite3_api->str_finish
603 #define sqlite3_str_appendf            sqlite3_api->str_appendf
604 #define sqlite3_str_vappendf           sqlite3_api->str_vappendf
605 #define sqlite3_str_append             sqlite3_api->str_append
606 #define sqlite3_str_appendall          sqlite3_api->str_appendall
607 #define sqlite3_str_appendchar         sqlite3_api->str_appendchar
608 #define sqlite3_str_reset              sqlite3_api->str_reset
609 #define sqlite3_str_errcode            sqlite3_api->str_errcode
610 #define sqlite3_str_length             sqlite3_api->str_length
611 #define sqlite3_str_value              sqlite3_api->str_value
612 /* Version 3.25.0 and later */
613 #define sqlite3_create_window_function sqlite3_api->create_window_function
614 /* Version 3.26.0 and later */
615 #define sqlite3_normalized_sql         sqlite3_api->normalized_sql
616 /* Version 3.28.0 and later */
617 #define sqlite3_stmt_isexplain         sqlite3_api->isexplain
618 #define sqlite3_value_frombind         sqlite3_api->frombind
619 /* Version 3.30.0 and later */
620 #define sqlite3_drop_modules           sqlite3_api->drop_modules






621 #endif /* !defined(SQLITE_CORE) && !defined(SQLITE_OMIT_LOAD_EXTENSION) */
622 
623 #if !defined(SQLITE_CORE) && !defined(SQLITE_OMIT_LOAD_EXTENSION)
624   /* This case when the file really is being compiled as a loadable
625   ** extension */
626 # define SQLITE_EXTENSION_INIT1     const sqlite3_api_routines *sqlite3_api=0;
627 # define SQLITE_EXTENSION_INIT2(v)  sqlite3_api=v;
628 # define SQLITE_EXTENSION_INIT3     \
629     extern const sqlite3_api_routines *sqlite3_api;
630 #else
631   /* This case when the file is being statically linked into the
632   ** application */
633 # define SQLITE_EXTENSION_INIT1     /*no-op*/
634 # define SQLITE_EXTENSION_INIT2(v)  (void)v; /* unused parameter */
635 # define SQLITE_EXTENSION_INIT3     /*no-op*/
636 #endif
637 
638 #endif /* SQLITE3EXT_H */

327   /* Version 3.31.0 and later */
328   sqlite3_int64 (*hard_heap_limit64)(sqlite3_int64);
329   const char *(*uri_key)(const char*,int);
330   const char *(*filename_database)(const char*);

332   const char *(*filename_wal)(const char*);
333 };

335 /*
336 ** This is the function signature used for all extension entry points.  It
337 ** is also defined in the file "loadext.c".
338 */
339 typedef int (*sqlite3_loadext_entry)(
340   sqlite3 *db,                       /* Handle to the database. */
341   char **pzErrMsg,                   /* Used to set error string on failure. */
342   const sqlite3_api_routines *pThunk /* Extension API function pointers. */
343 );
